The strange sound of a barking dog seems to pierce your dull morning haze. You look around fuzzily wondering where the sound was coming from - as far as you knew your aunt and cousins did not have a dog - and only then do you slowly realize just where you are and what's going on.

You see the mattress that you hauled up from the cellar lying in the center of the room with your clothes from yesterday piled on top. You vaguely recall bits and pieces of the previous day; your Aunt Laura's... energetic greeting when you finally arrived after your long bus trip, meeting your cousin Alice again and agreeing not only to stay in her room for the duration of your forced visit, but agreeing to do her chores while there for the next month. Your head spins a bit trying to get a grip on all that happened. You know that your aunt and her daughters had all always been a bit eccentric and more than a little domineering towards you, but some of the things flitting through your memory seem a bit bizarre even for them.

"Hey!"

The sound of your cousin's voice seems to snap you out of your confusion. You whip your head around and see Alice perched on the edge of the bed, her long hair in her familiar pigtails and wearing an oversized purple Vikings jersey as a nightdress. It's morning you realize and then remember collapsing on the mattress sometime last night, apparently sleeping straight through after your exhausting day before. Alice is grinning widely as she looks down on you from on high with her sexy legs crossed and casually swinging her pretty bare foot.

"I told you to bark again, Patrick," she says casually recrossing her legs. You try not to stare but the simple movements are so soothing to you. But somewhere in the back of your mind you recall her saying that and you wonder why, and why you're on your hands and knees on the floor at her feet in the first place. Things start to click and fall into place as you recall your clothes piled up on the mattress behind you. You realize you're naked as you look up at her feeling another 'bark' building in your throat.

Alice has been trying her hypnosis techniques on you, you realize and quickly clench your eyelids shut. Whatever she's doing to you, you have to fight back.

"No..." you whisper shaking your head trying to regain control. You feel your body shaking; trying to fight off the effects of whatever she has been doing to you for the past day. "This isn't right..."

You open your eyes to see Alice holding up her cell phone and you remember the picture she's already taken and threatened to send to your parents if you didn't do whatever she asks.

"I guess you're a little more strong-willed than I thought you were, Patrick," she says as her fingers fly over the phone's keyboard. "Maybe you were tired yesterday. Whatever, I'm sure your mother will love to see these pictures."

"No!" Something finally snaps inside of you and you lunge up off the floor. Alice squeaks in surprise as you pounce on her forcing her back and down onto the bed with your weight. You both struggle as you lay atop her thrashing around, your only intent to get that cell phone away from her and delete those photos. She fights back though and you feel her slaps and scratches as you grope for the phone trying to pin her down.

"Hey! Get off her!"

Suddenly you feel an arm snake around your throat and tightening. You gasp as you are hoisted back and off of the bed and Alice and swung around through the air to come crashing back down on the floor. You feel a weight on your back as someone grabs your right arm and easily twists it up behind your back, wrenching your hand high between your shoulder blades. You whimper as whoever holds you twists and forces your head to the floor. Your every breath is strained as you gasp and smell the tangy aroma of sweat as your captor holds you tight and helpless.

"What the hell is going on?"

You barely recognize your cousin Marissa's voice as your blood pounds and you struggle to breathe. Her left arm grinds into your throat cutting off your oxygen as she holds you in some wrestling pose. From past experience you know that it's pointless to fight back as she's had you groveling in the dirt many times over the years. Not that she's stronger than you, but she's focused and become the Captain of her wrestling team at her school. Like Alice and even Anna your younger cousin, they all like to practice on you.

"He attacked me," Alice whines somewhere in the background.

"Uh-huh," Marissa says somewhat dubiously. "And what were you doing to him, Sis? Playing Mesmero again? You hypnotized him, didn't you?"

"Well... I was just practicing. He's so weak-willed, he makes a good subject." You could hear the pouty sound to Alice's voice through the pounding flow of blood rushing in your ears. Little flecks of gray starting to flit through your vision as you fought uselessly for breath.

"We know he's weak," Marissa said as she hefted your limp weight up and started to turn you around. With little effort you were soon facing the bed again and Alice's dangling feet. "You remember what Mom said..."

"I was being nice!" Alice snapped, obviously annoyed with her older sister's reprimand. You can feel Marissa easing you forward until Alice's feet are right in front of your face.

"Why's he naked then?"

"We were just playing..." You can barely see Alice's pretty toes wiggling under your face as you struggle for air. She slides her feet closer and you can smell their intoxicating odor adding to your light-headedness as she strokes your cheek with her toes. She pushes back slightly mashing your nose but you can still smell the slight odor of her foot. It's intoxicating and you breathe even more deeply as she grinds the sole of her sandal into you.

"I just wish I could figure out what I'm doing wrong," she says glumly. There's nothing wrong as far as you can tell as you slip your tongue between your lips and lick the sole of her sandal. You taste the dust and grit but swallow it happily knowing that is what you should do to make her happy. "You're not that strong-willed, Patty. You never have been, and I'm doing everything right. You shouldn't be breaking your trance so quick - "

"Alice! Patrick! C'mon! Breakfast!" You hear your Aunt Laura shouting from somewhere far away and somewhere deep within you you realize that you are hungry. Your mind swirls as you try to remember when was the last time you ate; maybe a burger at a bus stop the day before, hours ago. You seem to focus on that hunger as you shake your head but then Alice pushes with her sandaled foot and you fall back sprawling on the mattress in the middle of the floor. Alice quickly steps forward and her foot is in your face again, pressing down.

The scent of her foot overwhelms you; her foot odor laced with violet from her last shower, the leather of her sandals as she grinds down on your face. Through a daze of bliss you see her leaning in, towering over you and you're happy that her smile has returned.

"We're going down to breakfast now, Patty. My mom and my sisters are going to want to play with you, but I want you to remember something. Can you do that?" You groan as Alice rubs her sole along your face. "Good boy. Now I want you to do whatever my family tells you to; understand?"

"Yes, Alice," you say softly before her toes brush your lips.

"They're going to want to play with you too, but that's okay. That'll make me happy if you do. And you want to make me happy, right, Patty?"

"Yes, Miss Alice," you mumble as you breathe deeply, your tongue lapping at the sole of her sandal.

"Good boy. But I want you to remember just whose room you're staying in for the next month and just who you want to please the most. Who is that, Patty?"

"You, Miss Alice."

"Good," Alice says as she takes her foot away and steps back. You look up hurt and wanting as you lie on the floor staring up at her. Her smirk sends a shiver through you as you scramble to get back up and on your knees. You hear her laughing as she steps even further away, out of reach as she strolls for the door.

"Shove that nasty mattress under the bed, Patty, then join us downstairs." Alice opens the door and strides haughtily out into the hall without a backwards glance. You watch her go enraptured by her grace until she is out of sight, then hurry to do as she asked.

You get up and shove the mattress that is to be your bed for the next month under your cousin's bed, happy to please her and to be allowed so close to her. Something about that nags in the back of your mind though as you stand tall and smooth down your pretty pink dress. You shake your head to clear your thoughts as you raise your right foot and rub your flat against the back of your left leg hoping to give the battered old shoe a bit of a shine. You switch feet, then hurry to the door.

You don't want to keep Alice waiting...
13413112112.title: Patrick Breaks Free... Or Does He...

134131121123.content:
"Oh, my..."

You look up as you hurry downstairs and into the kitchen at the sound of your Aunt Laura's voice. You can smell the tantalizing scents of fresh brewed coffee and fried bacon as you round the corner and go through the doorway to see your three cousins seated at the kitchen table and your aunt at the stove dishing up a plate of breakfast; bacon, eggs, toast, coffee, milk and juice. Your stomach rumbles as you hear your cousins giggle.

"What are you wearing, Patrick?" your aunt asks as she sets the full plate of food on the table in front of your cousin, Marissa. Marissa grins as she plucks up a crispy strip of bacon and takes a bite, her gaze sweeping you up and down. You look down at your aunt's words and vaguely see the short pink dress that your cousin, Alice gave you to wear. Your head spins a bit and you step to the side putting a hand against the closest wall for support.

"He looks like a maid," Marissa says after a sip of coffee and another bite of bacon.

"I..." you try to say, try to form a sentence but your younger cousin cuts in:

"I think he looks cute," Anna says with a wide smile and a blush. You look down trying to find your voice and see her sandaled feet kicking under the table catching your gaze. Your eyes rivet on your family's feet; Anna and Alice's sandaled, Marissa wearing ankle socks and your Aunt Laura in a pair of summer flats. You blink, trying to shake out of your stupor but Alice's words keep coming back to haunt you...

"...you want to make me happy, right, Patty?"

"You would, Squirt," Marissa says with a laugh. "We all know what you want."

"Shut up!" Anna shouts and pouts trying not to look at you. You push off of the wall and sway a bit as the room seems to swim.

"Alice," Aunt Laura says as she takes her seat at the table. "What have you been up to? Have you been playing your little games with your poor cousin, Patrick?"

"Well..." Alice says with a grin then turns her attention to her plate of food. She eats a bit as you stand there watching, your gaze focused down under the table. "Patrick... confessed that he... wanted to help out while he's here."

"Oh?" your aunt says as she smiles at you. "How so?" You see her recross her legs under the table and pop the heel of her shoe off her foot as she bobs her leg.

"He offered to clean my room while he's here," Alice says and you see her foot twirl under the table.

"Neat!" Anna says scooping a huge forkful of eggs into her mouth.

"It'd be nice if he cleaned all our rooms," Marissa added leaning back in her chair. She had her hair tied back into a tail Patrick noticed and had changed into sweats from her earlier running gear apparently after a shower. She took a bite of toast looking you up and down like a cat eyeing a cornered mouse.

"Mmmmn..." your aunt coos, "That would be nice. And if you want to help out and earn your keep, Patrick, I'm sure we can find plenty to keep you entertained."

"I know I could!" Anna blurted and giggled. Marissa snorted.

"I bet you could, dear," your aunt agreed sipping her coffee and looking to Alice, then you. "Is that really what you want, Patrick?" she asked.

You look to Alice but she simply smirks and nibbles at a slice of bacon. Finally she nods oh so slightly, you're certain you're the only one who sees it.

"Yes, Aunt Laura," you hear yourself saying, immediately regretting your words. You've just given yourself to your aunt and cousins for the next month and can't begin to imagine what that might mean. You're soon to discover as your aunt leans back in her chair and recrosses her legs again. She glances at the counter and stove with a grin.

"That's wonderful, Patrick. I'm so happy," she says clapping her hands with delight. "You should eat though. You missed dinner last night. Scoop up whatever's left. There should be another plate, I think."

Like a zombie you head for the stove and find a bowl instead of a plate. You scoop up the scraps left in the pans; a slice of fatty bacon, a spoonful of eggs and a piece of dry white toast. The coffee and milk are gone and you only see pits in the bottom of the orange juice pitcher.

"That's fine, Patrick. let's see what you've got."

You turn and move to the table holding out your bowl to your aunt. She nods, but Marissa reaches out and snags the last strip of bacon.

"I'll take that," she says with a wide grin crunching down the strip. You hear Alice laugh and a second later she snatches your piece of toast.

"Sorry, Patty... Still hungry," she says but you see that her plate is barely touched. You try to say something but your aunt speaks up, cutting you off:

"Patty?"

"Well..." Alice says, "he wanted to fit in. House full of women, y'know? We figured, Patty." Alice smirked and Marissa laughed.

"Jeez, Alice..."

"Well, Patty," Aunt Laura says cutting off he daughters, "You should eat while you have some." Your Aunt Laura takes the bowl from your hands and sets it on the floor at her feet. She then reaches out and takes your fork with a smile.

"There you go," she says with a giggle. "Eat up, then you can get going on the dishes."

You look towards the counter and sink and see the filthy pots and pans sopping with grease, the counter full of crumbs and then the table with all the plates and glasses. Your cousins are all watching you, but you look to Alice and she simply smiles and nods.

You groan as you drop to your knees somehow feeling this is not right. Still you lean in and hover over the bowl of cooling scrambled eggs. You ARE hungry you realize after the previous night and the long bus ride before. You lower your face into the bowl and start to eat the eggs; soon feeling your aunt's foot on the back of your head pressing down.

"Good girl, Patty," you hear her say and you eat all the faster.

Wanting to please...
134131121123.title: The Whole Family Enjoys

choices: You Clean the Kitchen and Go to Find Aunt Laura...
You Hear a Phone Ring Somewhere...
You Realize You are Being Used and Try to Get Away...
1341311211233.content:
As you feel the weight of Aunt Laura's foot on the back of your head pressing your face into the small bowl of cooling eggs you seem to hear a tiny voice screaming somewhere in the back of your mind:

This is wrong! Get up!

You blink and groan as you feel her foot rubbing softly ruffling your hair. She's not pressing hard and you're sure that you could rise up if you really wanted to, but almost as loud as that tiny voice is another whispering just how right this is. That voice sounds just like your cousin, Alice.

As you eat you can see your pretty cousin's feet off to the right just out of the corner of your eye. Alice has her right leg over her left and her foot is bobbing and twirling at the ankle. You watch entranced as you lick at the cold eggs, your gaze fixated as she wiggles her toes and that tiny voice seems to fade away again and finally choke off. You can't imagine what you were possibly thinking. Serving your aunt and cousins is certainly the right thing to do as they are allowing you into their home for an entire month while your parents are away.

As you return your attention to the cold eggs you feel a new sensation. You shiver as something snakes between your splayed legs and begins to caress and pet. It's firm but soft at the same time as it slides along your groin and you start to squirm. Smooth like cotton; a gloved hand but so different as it strokes. You can't seem to focus on your breakfast and finally realize through your cloudy thinking that it must be your cousin Marissa's foot.

You whimper as you try to eat and feel your aunt's foot again; momentarily forgotten. Her foot shifts and you feel her heel digging into the back of your neck dragging at the base of your skull. You can hear your relatives whispering at the table above you as you try to eat your morning meal. You can't focus on their talking though and barely the last of your eggs as Marissa continues to rub casually as Alice twists and twirls her foot.

You gasp as you feel something new touching your left thigh. It's almost totally bare you realize as you force your gaze to look and see your youngest cousin, Anna's feet resting there. You try to close your eyes or at least turn away but again you are mesmerized by her simple movements; her sandal-clad feet shifting on your skin, rubbing as she gets comfortable.

You start as you hear something thump to the floor beside your head. As your gaze shifts to see what it was you immediately smell something bad. You gag as your tongue scoops up the last bit of cold, slimy egg and try to swallow, the sudden, unexpected stench almost too much to bear. You glance to the side and see your aunt's old, dirty ballet flat lying on its side right near your bowl. A second later you feel Aunt Laura's bare foot sliding along your face. You finally clench your eyelids shut as you smell the foul, sweaty odor of old leather and unwashed feet with a faint, sickening trace of strawberry. The eggs roil and rumble in your stomach...

"All done, Patrick?" You hear your aunt's voice coming sweetly from high above and far away. You try to speak but don't trust your stomach so simply nod.

"Patty, Mom," Alice says still swinging her leg. "Call him, Patty. That's what he wants."

"All right," your aunt replies as your two other cousins giggle. You feel Anna remove her feet sliding the soles of her sandals down along your skin with enough force on your thighs to make you wince. Or maybe it was Marissa's foot tapping your groin before she pulled her sock-covered foot back and away that caused you to jump. Whatever, you hunker there beneath the kitchen table tired, sick and frustrated.

"All right, Patty it is," your aunt says as she removes her foot from the back of your head. You watch in a daze as she flips her flat upright and slowly slides her foot back inside. You stare as she shifts and jiggles her foot to work it in, then finally stands, pushing her chair back.

"You can get up then, Patty." You back out from under the table, the queasy feeling leaving you as you struggle to stand up. You grasp the table's edge as you reach your knees and your head spins and can't understand why you are so exhausted. You take deep breaths and feel the eyes of your four relatives on you.

"Jeez, Alice," Marissa says and you hear Anna giggle. "What did you do?"

"Nothing!" Alice snaps with a sulking sound in her voice. "He wants this," she adds, "I just... gave him a push is all."

"He's cute!" Anna laughs and you hear the others groan.

"Yes he is, Dear," your aunt says, "VERY cute, but he has work to do now. And I'm sure you all have something better to do than antagonize him." You see your Aunt Laura put her hands on her hips and take on a demanding demeanor as she looks at each of her daughters.

"I've got my aerobics class at the Gym in about an hour," Marissa says as she stands. "I guess I better get ready."

"I haven't finished that book I got a couple days ago," Alice adds as she wipes her mouth and pushes back from the table. "I probably should," she says, standing. "It might... y'know... help."

"Anna?" your aunt says after a seemingly tense silence. Your vision seems to clear a bit as you look across the table at your younger cousin and see her watching you with a frown.

"I don't have anything to do," she says as she stands. "I wanted to play with, Patrick."

"Yeah, right," Marissa snorts as she steps away from the table with a wave. "Have fun," she continues as she leaves the kitchen and heads running up the stairs. "See you later."

"Patty's going to be busy, Dear," Aunt Laura soothes as she moves around the table and caresses Anna's shoulder. "You'll have a chance to play later." You hear Alice Hrrumph!

"Maybe."

"A little late for that, Alice," your aunt says as Anna gets up. Alice sighs and follows suit. "You started this."

"Fine!" she says and storms off following Marissa back upstairs. You stare at her feet until they are out of sight wishing that you were following her close behind. you blink as you turn back to your aunt and youngest cousin. You see Anna grinning widely.

"You go play in your room, Dear, or go watch TV," Aunt Laura says giving Anna a playful swat. "Patty wants to helps and he has to clean the kitchen right now. Maybe if he hurries you two can play something before lunch."

"Cool!" Anna almost squeals with delight as she beams a wide smile at you. "I know just what we can play!" And before you know it Anna is gone. You hear her feet pounding up the stairs as she runs for her room; the slam of her closing door. You look at your aunt then, wondering what to do next and find her smiling at you.

Her dark eyes shift up and down as her smile widens, taking you in. You feel uncomfortable under her almost predatory gaze and shiver a bit as she walks about you; her hand tracing a line across your shoulders making you swallow hard. her hand drifts casually down your back and you feel her cup your butt cheek before she steps to the kitchen cabinets.

"I'm so happy you volunteered to help us out, Patty," she says as she opens one of the lower cupboards bending at the waist. Your eyes bulge as her ass seems to fill her short shorts, her legs stiff and so toned and firm as she digs through the cabinet. "Really, you'd think with four of us here there wouldn't be too much work, but confidentially; my girls are lazy... Ah! Here it is."

Your aunt nudges the cabinet door closed with her foot then sashays towards you; stepping behind you with a grin. You hear something and then feel her arms wrap about your waist as she leans in close and starts talking again:

"Truth to tell, I'm a bit lazy too," she whispers into your ear. You feel her hot breath on your neck as she moves closer. You feel her breasts in your back as her arms and hands tug something to your waist. She pulls back and you stagger into her. She moans slightly as you feel her hands doing something behind you...

"It'll be nice to have you helping out," she says as she knots a frilly, lacy apron about your waist. You gasp as she tugs tight and giggles, pressing up against you. You can feel her warmth as she ties the knots over and over. "I hate chores," she says as she hisses in your ear right before you feel her warm tongue gliding over your skin.

You feel a shove and stagger forward thumping up against the kitchen table as your aunt strolls off towards the door. You look at the filthy mess left behind; the table, the sink full of greasy pots and pans, your own bowl on the floor still."You clean up in here," your aunt says as she pauses in the doorway, "then come find me and we'll find you something else to do." Your Aunt Laura smiles wickedly and licks her lips before leaving you to your chores.

You shake your head feeling confused but the dirty dishes draw your attention back and you start to gather them, placing them in the sink...

Wanting to please...
1341311211233.title: Aunt Laura Has More Ideas...

choices: Aunt Laura Comes Looking For You...
13413112112331.content:
You feel dizzy as you wipe the sponge over the surface of the stove, swaying a bit and having to lean against the counter as your mind reels. Your stomach is queasy and rumbles as you lick your dry lips tasting something foul on your tongue and smelling an odor that seems very familiar but you can't quite place.

You gasp taking deep breaths, trying to clear your head as flickers of strange memories rise up:

Washing the dishes and scrubbing down the kitchen looking like a maid in the pink, girly dress that your cousin Alice gave you to wear...

On your hands and knees and under the kitchen table eating your breakfast of cold eggs as your Aunt Laura and your cousins used you as a foot rest...

On your knees and kissing your cousin Alice's feet after she...

"Hypnotized me," you whisper, the images of your cousin's pretty feet dangling in your face making you lean against the counter top again for support. Your head spins as you realize just thinking about her is enough to make you drift away again. You have no idea how she did it - it's as though a big chunk of the past couple of days is missing from your memory - but you know why.

Your cousin Alice - Hell, your aunt, Laura and cousins, Marissa and Anna have always liked to play with you... Dominate you, though why you have no idea. You never wanted it, and you tried to explain that to your mother before your parents packed you onto a bus and sent you here to Aunt Laura's for the next month. And now, thanks to whatever Alice did to you, they seem to have gotten their way.

"Screw this," you hiss as you toss the filthy sponge into the sink and head for the doorway. You know you have to get out of this house and away from these women; but then you glance down and see what you're wearing: A too short pink and white little girl's dress, old, black leather flats and a frilly apron knotted about your waist. You sigh and thump your fist against the door frame. You need your clothes but they're up in Alice's room.

You fiddle and fidget with the knots in the apron as you try to think what to do but you find that your Aunt Laura made no pretense of even trying to tie a bow; simply knotting the apron's ties over and over. It wasn't coming off without scissors, so the dress was not coming off either; at least not yet. You think about kicking off the old, dirty shoes in defiance but then worry that someone might spot them and ruin your escape attempt. You clench your eyelids tight and pinch the bridge of your nose wondering why it's all so complicated.

You take another deep breath and ease out into the hallway. You see the stairs just a few feet away but as you move in that direction you hear the sounds of the television coming from the living room. Unconsciously you glance that way towards the noise and flickering lights and see your Aunt Laura's legs and feet propped up on a footstool just in your line of sight. You stumble and pause...

Your resolve weakens as you stare at her soft, pretty feet; her toes wiggling slightly as you hear her laughing at something on the TV. You remember that she wanted you to go and find her after you finished in the kitchen and stagger as your legs seem to lead you in that direction...

"Patrick!"

You look down as you feel a soft hand grab your arm and you stop in mid-step. It takes a moment to focus but you finally see your little cousin, Anna looking up at you. You can't help but think how cute she looks with her long sandy blonde hair in a side ponytail, dressed in a denim skirt, spaghetti-string black top and sandals. You feel a sudden, overwhelming urge to make her happy then shake your head as she squeezes your arm.

Anna looks towards the living room and you follow her gaze feeling confused suddenly. You were doing something, but what...

"I think it's mean what Alice did to you," Anna says as her hand slides down your arm and grips your hand. She moves quietly, almost tip-toeing to the stairs tugging you along. "I'll help you, Patrick. Don't worry."

You're not worried as she moves past the entry to the living room and heads up the stairs. You glance towards your aunt as you pass but she seems enraptured by whatever's on the television; some show you should know by the catchy music but can't quite place. It doesn't matter as you follow Anna up the stairs and onto the second floor, hesitating as you pass your cousin Alice's closed door...

"Clothes," you mumble as Anna tugs on your hand trying to keep you moving. "I need my clothes," you say but Anna jerks hard and you shuffle into step behind her leading you down the hall and to her room.

"There's no time for that now, Patrick," Anna says as she drags you into her room and slams the door shut behind you both. You see a girly swath of pink in the room as you stumble forward falling into a pile of stuffed animals heaped up on the top of her bed. You try to right yourself and get up but before you can even move you feel your little ten-year-old cousin's weight pounce onto your back holding you down.

"I have to hide you," Anna says as she grabs your wrists and tugs them back. You wonder what she's doing as you try to pull away - she's only ten after all - but you feel so weak and disoriented that you can't seem to get your limbs to move anymore. You rock back and forth a bit but Anna simply scoots forward as she loops something about your wrists and starts binding them together.

"You gotta stay still though!" she says as she knots off the plastic feeling rope. You strain to look back as she leans to the side and see a neon green jump rope wrapped and secured about your wrists. You tug and squirm a bit as Anna resettles on your back but are surprised that the knots are so tight and tied just so; behind your hands and unreachable. "I don't want any of them to find you. They're mean!"

"Wha..." you start to protest when your cousin's hand flashes past your eyes. You smell something bad as she presses a white cloth to your lips. You gasp and inhale and realize that it's one of her old, dirty ankle socks. Your head spins as she pokes the sock past your lips and teeth and deep into your mouth until you are gagging.

"You gotta be quiet too," she says as a second later one of her filthy soccer socks cleaves between your lips and she rears back hard. "If Alice hears you she'll get'cha again." Anna tugs hard and you feel her knotting the longer sock at the nape of your neck, over and over. "I'll keep you safe! Don't worry."

Anna fastens a final knot in your gag - you realize that's what it really is - then she scoots off of you. You feel her wrapping more rope about your ankles and then above and below your knees. You try to squirm out of her grip but by the time you realize what she's doing it's too late and she's folding your legs up and over and tying another rope tightly between your wrists and ankles.

You feel her hands on you; on the ropes giving each a final tug before she settles onto the floor on her knees right before you. You look at her young, grinning face through bleary eyes as she giggles and leans in close kissing you on the nose.

"You're so cute, Patty," she says and somewhere in the back of your mind you realize this has all been her attempt to dominate you. She's no better than your aunt and other cousins. You grumble and thrash around but it just makes her laugh.

"I do want to hide you though," she says as she gets up on her feet again and grabs your legs. Far easier than you might imagine for a little girl she spins you about and suddenly you are screaming into your gag as you tumble off of her bed.

"Ummmpph!" you groan as you hit the floor, your shoulder aching from the impact. You writhe around as Anna drops down on her knees beside you and presses her hands over your mouth and nose...

"SHhhhhhh..." she hisses as you try to breathe and shake your head, but she's pressing way too hard for you to move. "You gotta be quiet! Alice will hear you and I don't want her to find you!" Anna grins down at you. "I don't want any of them to find you..."

Anna suddenly leans way over and presses her hands on your arms and legs. She gives a grunt as she shoves pushing you backwards and under her bed as far as she can manage. Satisfied she lays down and smiles at you, reaching out and brushing your hair out of your eyes.

"You'll be safe under here," she says with a giggle. "I'll sneak into Alice's room and get your stuff and they'll all think you ran away. I'll keep you here all month and take you out and play with you. You'll be like my puppy. I always wanted a puppy! Yay!"

You start to struggle as your little cousin gives a chuckle and blows you a kiss. She stands up then and the last thing you see before she drops the skirt of her bedspread down is her pretty, sandaled feet and you are cloaked in darkness under her bed...

Alice's commands making you weak and helpless...
13413112112331.title: You Clean the Kitchen and Go to Find Aunt Laura...

choices: Anna Continues to Play with You...
Marisa Comes Home and Finds You...
You Somehow Manage to Escape Your Bonds...
134131121123313.content:
You lose track of time there in the darkness under your little cousin's bed. You saw her shadowy movements cast on the floor for awhile after she hid you from your aunt and other cousins; walking around her room and humming - actually humming - as though there was nothing wrong with having an older boy tied up and hidden under her bed. You struggled all the mightier when you heard her footfalls leaving the room and her door closing behind her.

You can't believe how stupid you were to let a little ten-year-old girl tie you up and kidnap you. Idiot!

You twist around in the dark under the bed feeling the dirt and grit beneath you as you tug on your bonds. Your legs are already beginning to ache and cramp from the severe position that Anna has you tied in with your ankles knotted off to your wrists. Dust swirls into your face and nose causing you to sneeze into your gag as your struggles increase. You writhe around feeling the heat rising in you from your exertions. You strain at the rubbery plastic jump rope binding your wrists with all your might wondering why you feel so weak and sluggish. It's like you're trapped in some nightmare running for your life and unable to wake up.

Finally you sag in defeat, hot and sweating and no closer to freedom than when you began your struggles. It's hard to breathe around the socks gagging your mouth and your sneezing has all but plugged your nose. You lie back exhausted; breathing heavily and listening, actually hoping for Anna's return and an end to her little game.

You hear music seeping through the closed door from somewhere nearby and even further the faint sounds of a television playing far away. There are footsteps and laughter and you realize that life is going on without you and that just makes it all the worse. You realize just how helpless you are and suddenly, totally at the mercy of your little cousin... your aunt... her whole family!

"Patty?"

You hear a quick sharp knock and then the bedroom door squeals; a shaft of light from the hallway stretching into the room. You roll partially onto your stomach as best you can then press your face down against the hardwood floor trying to peer under the slight gap between the bedspread and the floor.

It takes a moment to focus into the light but movement catches your eye and you see your aunt's feet softly walking in the distance. You recognize the old black leather flats that she was wearing at breakfast as she steps deeper into the room walking slowly and pausing. You draw a deep, ragged breath through your nose planning on screaming for help as she suddenly steps away towards the closet.

"Patty?" she says again and you hear the closet door open. She's looking for you - obviously - and you suddenly wonder if it's such a good idea after all to get her attention.

You know for some strange reason your mother's whole extended family has a dominant streak and right now - with you spending the next month in their home - all of that attention seems to be focusing on you. And of the four women in the household, your Aunt Laura maybe worries you the worst. You know that she's been lonely and upset since her husband disappeared over a year ago. your mother was clear on that, but your aunt had always been a flirtatious woman you knew and recalled growing up.

You remember the occasional pinch or swat on your ass when no one was looking those times when your family came to visit. You remember those times when you walked into a room to find her waiting wearing skimpy, revealing clothes, if not half-naked. The sly smiles and the casual winks that made you feel funny when you were younger but now know them for what they were. You can only imagine how she would react to find you tied up and helpless and you blush and burn at the mere thought.

You breathe out slowly as you hear the closet door close again. You hear the sound of her footfalls as she comes closer and soon you are staring at her feet just inches away from your face beyond the edge of the bed. The shoes are old and you can smell her feet and the leather as she shifts her weight. You can see how soft and smooth her skin seems as all of your attention seems riveted on the simple movements of her pretty feet. You start to wriggle closer...

"Mom?"

Suddenly you blink as the spell is broken and your aunt's feet step back out of reach. You whimper into your gag as you shake your head wondering why your thinking is so fuzzy all of a sudden, hearing Anna's voice again.

"What's up, Mom?" your cousin asks and then you see her feet still clad in sandals stepping up into sight to join your aunt's. Her feet are smaller of course but no less pretty; almost... mesmerizing...

"Have you seen, Patty, Sweetie?" your aunt asks as she turns around and sits on the edge of the bed. You hear the bed groan and feel the frame actually brush your shoulder, bowing in the middle with the weight. "He was supposed to come find me after he finished the kitchen but he never showed up."

"No, Mom," your cousin replies sweetly, "not in awhile." Honestly too you have to admit. You wonder if this whole branch of the family is smarter than you; even your ten-year-old cousin, Anna.

You squirm as you watch your aunt and cousin; their freedom while you are trapped and helpless just inches away tied up under the bed. "Okay!" Anna yelled. "I'm ready!"
